title: Solana Meme Coin Presales Have Raised $150 Million—What Could Go Wrong?

title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
description:
Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

Victims of FTX have issued statements ahead of the planned sentencing of Sam Bankman-Fried. The Japanese government is looking at diversifying its pension fund and considering adding Bitcoin to its portfolio. Meanwhile, a United States district court judge has imposed sanctions on the United States Securities and Exchange Commission over “gross misconduct” in last year’s Debt Box case. 

FTX victims issue statements ahead of SBF sentencing

Victims of failed crypto exchange FTX have issued statements ahead of Sam Bankman-Fried’s sentencing later this month.

Read more

title: Ethereum price drops 20% in a week, but investors are still bullish
description:
ETH price fell by 20% in the past week, but futures data shows investors still believe in the bull trend.

Ether (ETH) price experienced a 20% increase from March 3 to March 13, culminating in a double top formation near $4,100. Following the second rejection, ETH underwent a 20% correction, testing the $3,200 support on March 19. Analysts suggest that the initial rally was fueled by overly leveraged long positions.

Ether’s bullish momentum faded following the forced liquidation of $375 million in ETH futures over the past week, but the question remains whether this is sufficient for Ether to stop the correction and potentially kick-start a bull run again.

Ether's downturn was more pronounced than the broader cryptocurrency market's performance, which saw its market capitalization peak at $2.77 trillion on March 14, stabilizing around $2.35 trillion, a 15.5% drop over five days. Ether's relative performance suffered due to Bitcoin's (BTC) 12% weekly drop, Solana's (SOL) 21% increase, and Binance Coin's (BNB) slight 2% decrease during the same timeframe.

Read more

title: Solana Announces Recommendations and Measures to Deal With Network Congestion
description: The Solana Foundation has announced several recommendations that developers should follow to cope with the high usage that the network is currently experiencing. The foundation recommended implementing priority fees, and a series of optimizations to avoid dropping transactions. Also, an improved transaction scheduler is expected to be included in the next update. Solana Foundation Makes […]

title: Understanding the Threat of Prompt Injection in AI Systems
description: In the rapidly evolving landscape of artificial intelligence (AI) and machine learning (ML), the National Institute of Standards and Technology (NIST) remains vigilant, closely observing the AI lifecycle for potential cybersecurity vulnerabilities. title: VeChain Hackathon Success Stories Boost VeBetterDAO’s dApp Landscape
description: VeChain’s VeBetterDAO ecosystem saw significant advancements during the recent VeChain hackathon, showcasing innovative projects aimed at promoting sustainability.
